name: Front Line, Kannazuka
description: Legend has it that during a disaster hundreds of years ago, Kujou Shigeyori, a mortal general whom Her Highness valued greatly, built a battlefront fortress in just one night and fought valiantly against the forces of darkness, flying the banner of the Electro Mitsudomoe high. Hundreds of years later, the descendants of the Kujou family have also inherited outstanding military engineering skills.
